trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows status bar control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo de barra de estado do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> replaces and adds functionality to the StatusBar control of previous versions, StatusBar is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> substitui e adiciona funcionalidades ao controlo/barra de estado das versões anteriores, / barra de estado é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e para utilização futura, se escolher.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a StatusBar control consists of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, each of which displays text and/or an icon.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um controlo/barra de estado é composta por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos, cada um dos quais apresenta o texto e/ou de um ícone.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can also provide owner-drawn panels to provide custom panels such as a progress bar or a series of images that displays the state of your application.
trans-unit.target: Também pode fornecer painéis desenhada de proprietário para fornecer painéis personalizados, tais como uma barra de progresso ou uma série de imagens que apresenta o estado da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBar control typically displays information about an object being viewed on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo/barra de estado normalmente apresenta informações sobre um objeto que está a ser apresentado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, o objeto componentes ou nível contextual das informações que está relacionada com a operação desse objeto na sua aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBar control provides properties that enable you to customize the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo/barra de estado fornece propriedades que permitem-lhe personalizar o aspeto do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the StatusBar is displayed on a form that can be resized, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A> property to display a sizing grip in the lower-right corner of the form to indicate to users that the form can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se for apresentado StatusBar num formulário que pode ser redimensionado, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>propriedade para apresentar um grelha de dimensionamento no canto inferior direito do formulário para indicar aos utilizadores que o formulário pode ser redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property enables you to display panels within your StatusBar or to display only the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A>propriedade permite-lhe para apresentar painéis dentro da sua/barra de estado ou para apresentar apenas o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default StatusBar has no panels.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição/barra de estado não tem nenhum painéis.

trans-unit.source: To add panels to a StatusBar you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class that is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar painéis de ao/uma barra de estado pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>classe que está acessível através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> object provided through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to remove panels from the control and access a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to manipulate the panel.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>objeto fornecido através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>propriedade para remover painéis de controlo e acesso específico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>manipular o painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> object within a StatusBar control is clicked, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender determinar quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>é clicado objeto dentro de um controlo/barra de estado, pode criar um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To perform owner-draw operations on a panel, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar operações de desenho de proprietário um painel, pode criar um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The event data passed to the event handler provides information on the panel to draw and a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to perform drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos transmitidos para o processador de eventos fornece informações sobre o painel para desenhar e um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto a utilizar para efetuar tarefas de desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of StatusBar, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de/barra de estado, as propriedades de leitura/escrita são definidas para valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista destes valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> has no panels.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>não tem nenhum painéis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/escrita estão definidas para valores iniciais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>|`true`| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>| `true`| Pode alterar o valor para qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is an ambient property and will always return a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma propriedade de ambiente e sempre irá devolver um valor não nulo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the background color of the control
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que está a cor de fundo do controlo

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackColor*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem de fundo para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the background image for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de fundo para a definição um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>não tem qualquer efeito no aspecto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo, por isso não ser apresentado no designer ou por IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> que está a imagem de fundo para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImage*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImage*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o esquema da imagem de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackgroundImageLayout has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Definir o BackgroundImageLayout não tem qualquer efeito no aspecto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo, por isso não ser apresentado no designer ou por IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle*>.
trans-unit.target: Substituições <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> used to create the handle for this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> utilizado para criar o identificador para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> used to create the handle for this control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> utilizado para criar o identificador para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo predefinido de método de entrada Editor (IME) suportado por este controlo.

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Como implementados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>classe, esta propriedade devolve sempre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes dos recursos (que não seja memória) utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the docking behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comportamento de ancoragem o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Bottom" name="Bottom" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Bottom" name="Bottom" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker, however this property has no effect on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este controlo deve redesenhar a superfície de utilização de uma memória intermédia secundária para reduzir ou impedir flicker, no entanto esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo, por isso não ser apresentado no designer ou por IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has a secondary buffer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo tem uma memória intermédia secundária; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn status bar control changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um aspeto visual de um Estado desenhada de proprietário barra controlo é alterada.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform drawing operations in an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para efetuar operações de desenho de um proprietário-desenhada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you display an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays a progress bar, you can use this event to perform the drawing of the progress bar on the panel.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se lhe for apresentado um proprietário-desenhada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que mostra uma barra de progresso, pode utilizar este evento para executar o desenho da barra de progresso no painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The data provided to the event through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> object passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the panel that needs to be drawn and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to use to draw to the panel.
trans-unit.target: Os dados fornecidos para o evento através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>objecto transmitido como parâmetro para o processador de eventos permite-lhe determinar o painel que tem de ser desenhado e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a utilizar para desenhar para o painel.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento apenas é gerado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control will use to display information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de letra a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo irá utilizar para apresentar informações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> do texto.

trans-unit.source: The default is the font of the container, unless you override it.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o tipo de letra do contentor, a menos que substitui-lo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the forecolor for the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a forecolor do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the forecolor of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a forecolor do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Empty" name="Empty" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Empty" name="Empty" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ForeColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ForeColor*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de método de entrada Editor (IME) suportado por este controlo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ImeMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ImeMode*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the OnDrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o evento OnDrawItem.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDrawItem method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDrawItem também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When overriding OnHandleCreated in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao substituir OnHandleCreated numa classe derivada, lembre-se de que chamar a classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Layout" name="Layout" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Layout" name="Layout" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_LayoutEventArgs" name="LayoutEventArgs" href=""></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_LayoutEventArgs" name="LayoutEventArgs" href=""> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the OnMouseDown event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o evento OnMouseDown.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the OnPanelClick event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o evento OnPanelClick.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnPanelClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPanelClick também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem ligação de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the OnResize event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o evento OnResize.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição geral, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> redesenhado do controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> object on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> objeto num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo é clicado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks when a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para efetuar tarefas, quando um painel dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The data provided to the event through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs> passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that was clicked by the user in order to perform tasks on the selected panel.
trans-unit.target: Os dados fornecidos para o evento através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs>transmitida como um parâmetro para o processador de eventos permite-lhe determinar as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que foi clicado pelo utilizador para efetuar tarefas no painel selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> panels contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> painéis contidos no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control can display a number of panels to provide information to the user of your application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo pode apresentar um número de painéis para fornecer informações para o utilizador da sua aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, a panel could display the current time or the progress of a file download.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um painel foi possível apresentar a hora atual ou o progresso da transferência de um ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: Each panel displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Cada painel apresentado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo é uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The Panels property enables you to obtain a reference to the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de painéis permite-lhe obter uma referência à coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos que estão atualmente armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add panels, remove panels, access a specific panel within the collection, and obtain a count of the panels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Com esta referência, pode adicionar painéis, remover painéis, aceder a um painel específico da coleção e obter uma contagem dos painéis no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the panel collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as tarefas que podem ser efetuadas com a coleção de painel, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>Tópicos de referência de classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> containing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> objects of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>que contém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> objetos a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any panels that have been added to the control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se são apresentados os painéis que foram adicionados ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control displays the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property without any panels.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo apresenta o valor do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>propriedade sem quaisquer painéis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: When `ShowPanels` is set to `true`, any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando `ShowPanels` está definido como `true`, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos especificados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo são apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: No panels are initially created when you create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> class.
trans-unit.target: Não existem painéis inicialmente são criados quando cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: This collection class can be accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe de coleção pode ser acedida através da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if panels are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se forem apresentados painéis; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing grip is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma grelha de dimensionamento é apresentado no canto inferior direito do controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display a sizing grip to provide an indication to the user when a form is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para apresentar um grelha de dimensionamento para fornecer uma indicação para o utilizador quando um formulário é redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property of your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is set to a border style that is not resizable, such as<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>, you should set the SizingGrip property to `false` to prevent the user from thinking that the form can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>propriedade da sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>está definido como um estilo de limite que não é redimensionável, tal como<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>, deve definir a propriedade SizingGrip para `false` para impedir o utilizador a pensar que o formulário pode ser redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a sizing grip is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for apresentado um grelha de dimensionamento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user will be able to tab to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador conseguirá separador para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tab key moves focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla tab move o foco para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref>; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o texto apresentado pelo controlo.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control displays only the first 127 characters of a string.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlo apresenta apenas os primeiro 127 carateres de uma cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation for this control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma representação de cadeia para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: Cadeia

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
